anand.name: Anand Chakrobarty
anand.comment: Powerton Engineering made our solar energy project easy and convenient. Their team took care of everything from start to finish, and we are very pleased with the result.

sanjay.name: Sanjay Shukla
sanjay.comment: I was happy to choose Powerton Engineering for our installation, and I would not hesitate to recommend them to any of my friends.

rhea.name: Rhea Sharma
rhea.comment: Exceptional quality products and exceptional customer service. The team's technical expertise is impressive and very skilled.

priya.name: Priya Patil
priya.comment: Working with Powerton Engineering has been an amazing experience. Their automation processes have transformed our production processes and improved efficiency by thirty-five percent. Highly recommended for industrial automation projects.

kavya.name: Kavya Singh
kavya.comment: Exceptional service and technical support! The team provided exceptional guidance during the implementation of our solar project. Their professional approach and on-time delivery exceeded our expectations altogether.

rajesh.name: Rajesh Iyer
rajesh.comment: Powerton Engineering delivered exactly what they promised. The measurement instrument system they installed has been working well for over two years. Their after-sales support is excellent and they are always responsive.

seo.servicePageTitle: {{service}} Services | Industrial Automation & Control Systems | Powerton Engineering India
seo.servicePageDescription: Professional {{service}} services for industrial automation projects across India. {{description}}. ISO certified company with 15+ years expertise in electrical engineering, PLC SCADA DCS systems, control panel manufacturing, and process automation. Serving pharmaceutical, power plant, oil & gas, manufacturing industries. Expert in Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, ABB automation. 24/7 support | Free consultation | Pan-India coverage
seo.servicePageKeywords: {{service}} services India, {{service}} automation, industrial {{service}}, {{service}} engineering, {{service}} solutions, {{service}} companies India, {{service}} providers, {{service}} specialists, {{service}} consultants, industrial automation services, electrical engineering services, automation services India, control system services, PLC programming services, SCADA integration services, DCS engineering services, instrumentation services India

powerton.name: Powerton Engineering Pvt. Ltd.
powerton.description: ISO 9001:2015 certified industrial automation and electrical control panel manufacturing company serving pharmaceutical, power plant, oil & gas, chemical, manufacturing, water treatment, and renewable energy industries across India and globally. Premier automation systems integrator with 15+ years expertise in PLC SCADA DCS systems, instrumentation, process automation, and turnkey industrial projects. Award-winning engineering solutions provider with 1200+ successful installations. Specialized in Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, Honeywell, ABB, Rockwell automation technologies.
